afterSchool.title: After School Program
afterSchool.subtitle: Safe, Supervised, Stimulating
afterSchool.description: Our comprehensive after-school program provides a safe, nurturing environment where children can complete homework, engage in enriching activities, and develop social skills. With qualified educators and a structured yet flexible approach, we ensure your child thrives academically and personally.
features: Small group sizes for individual attention

pricing.note: Includes snacks, materials, and all activities

summerProgram.title: Summer Program
summerProgram.subtitle: Fun-Filled Summer Learning
summerProgram.description: Our exciting summer program combines learning with fun through field trips, STEM projects, arts and crafts, and outdoor adventures. Children stay engaged and continue learning while making new friends.

pricing.note: Includes lunch, snacks, and field trip fees
